Dil Ne Jise zindagi bhar Chaha Hai
Aaj Karunga Mai Unse Ikrar,
Jiski Sadiyo Se Tammanah Ki Hai,
Unse Karunga Mere Pyar Ka Izhaar.

Ek bar muskura ke kah do ham se pyaar hai tumko,
Ek bar ye bata do ke hamara intezaar hai tumko,
jindagi bhar karenge aapse hi ham ulfat bas,
kaho ki hamari is bat ka ikthiyaar hai tumko.

Honthon Se Pyaar Ke Fasaane Nahin Aate,
Sahil Pe Sumandar Ke Moti Nahin Aate,
Lelo Abhi Zindagi Mein Pyaar Ka Mazaa,
Phir Laut Ke Hum Jaise Deewane Nahin Aate.

Every Moment I Feel ur Love,
Every Second I Feel ur Beauty,
Every Hour I Feel ur Smile,
Every Day I Feel ur Beat.
Can you Be my Valentine,
For my Every Life.

Teri Ankhain jab juk kr
uthi to nasha ban gyi
Hame to pta hi nin chala e dost kab is dil tumare liye
Is dil me jgha ban gyi.

Tujhme baat he kuch aise hai
Dil na diya tumhe to jaan chali jaayegi.

Chale Gaye Hai Dur Kuch Pal K Liye,
Magar Karib Hai Har Pal K Liye,
Kise Bhulayenge Aapko Ak Pal K Liye,
Jab Ho Chuka Hai Pyar Umar Bhar K Liye.

Tum bohat saal reh liye apne,
Ab mere sirf mere ho ke raho.

Kuch Dair Ka Intezar Mila Hum Ko
Per Sub Se Sweet Yar Mila Hum Ko
Na Rahi Tamana Kisi Ki Tere Bad
Teri Muhabbat Se Wo Pyar Mila Humko.
Mere Dil Ki Taraf Se Happy Valentine Day
Mujhe Tum Se Behisaab Muhabbat Hai Meri Jaan.

More than ever, I love you

Kasoor toh tha hi en nigaaho ka,

Humne to khamosh rehne ki thani thi
Par bewafa ye zuban izhar kar betha.

Meri Hasratein machal gayi
Jab tumne socha ek pal ke liye,

Jab tum milogi muje umr bhar k liye.

Ab To Har Khusi Fhiki Lagti Hai tere Sath Na Hone Se
Jane Kan Si Khusboo Meri Saanso Me Basa Gaye Ho Tum
Zindagi Kya Hai Teri Mohabbat Ke Siwa
Ye Kaun Si Khwab Hai Jo Aankho Me Basa Gaye Ho Tum.

Jis Nazar Pe Tujhe Koi Inkar Na Ho
Us Dil Me Basa Tere Liye Pyaar Ho
Jis Bagh Me Koi Gulaab Na Ho
Un Baago Se Mera Koi Vasta Na Ho.

Har baar hum par ilzaam laga dete ho mohhabat ka,
Kabhi khud se pucha hai ki itne hassen ku ho.

Tere hothon pe ho bas muskan,
Aisa mein kuch aaj karu,
Na hone do kabhi mohabbat kam
Itna jee bhar ke tujh pyar karu.

Tujh se mile na the tou koi aarzoo na thi â€¦.

Likh do aaj meri har dhadkan naam tere,
Apne rag rag mein sama lon tujh ko,
Ho ke teri mein sanam
Aaj apna bana lon tujh ko.
Happy Valentineâ€™s Day Dear.

Apke aane se zindagi kitni Khubsurat hai,

cha lagta hai tera naam mere naam ke sathâ€¦

Kabhi hasata hai pyaar,
Kabhi rulata hai pyaar,
Har pal ki yaad dilata hai yeh pyaar,
Chaho ya na chaho,
Par aapke hone ka ehsaas dilata hai yeh pyaar.

Mere pyar ki pehchan tu hi to hai,
Mere jeene ka armaan tu hi to hai,
Kese bayan kare alam is dil ka
Meri aashiqui meri jaan tu hi to hai.

Koi Dukh Na Ho
Koi Gaam Na Ho
Koi Aankh Kabhi Purnam Na Ho
Koi Dil Kisi Ka Toray Na
Koi Saath Kisi Ka Choray Na
Bas Pyar Ki Nadiya Behti Ho
Kaash K Dunya Aisi Ho.

Tumhari Yaad Ki Khushboo Mere Daaman Se Lipti Hain,
